title: Add 15 static Problem→Solution blogs to Blog page and integrate provided SVG favicon

requirements.text: Update the existing Blog page route (/blog) to display 15 finance blog entries as static on-page content (brief Problem → Solution format) without fetching from the backend or running any default-content initialization.

quotes: Write all 15 unique blogs in blogs page in briefly  problem with solution

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /blog renders a list/grid of exactly 15 entries.
Each entry includes a clearly labeled “Problem:” line and a clearly labeled “Solution:” line, matching the user-provided text.
The page does not call blog preview queries/mutations (no loading state for fetching, and no automatic initialization when empty).
The Blog page works for unauthenticated users (consistent with current public navigation).

requirements.text: Add the provided SVG favicon to the frontend public assets as /favicon.svg and wire it into the app HTML head so browsers use it as the site favicon.
acceptanceCriteria: A new static file is present at frontend/public/favicon.svg containing the exact SVG content provided by the user.
frontend/index.html includes a <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg"> entry.
After build, the site shows the new favicon in the browser tab (where supported).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain single-actor (no new backend services).
nonGoals: Do not implement a dynamic blog/CMS system or store these 15 blogs in the backend.
Do not add new authentication requirements for viewing the Blog page.
Do not add social sharing, comments, or search for the static blog list.
